item.title: Multiple Categorization
item.description:
Status: in prep.

We’ve been using Representational Similarity Analysis to test whether we can decde the group identity of multiply categorized targets. Participants viewed videos of minimal in-group and out-group members who were also racial in-group or out-group members. We’ve found that we can easily decode either racial or minimal group identity, suggesting that both categories are simultaneous represented. We have yet to find a representational structure combining both categories.
